item.title: [Algorithms] LeetCode 189. Rotate Array
item.description: Given an array, rotate the array to the right by k steps, where k is non-negative. Example 1: Input: [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] and k = 3 Output: [5,6,7,1,2,3,4] Explanation: rotate 1 steps to the right: [7,1,2,3,4,5,6] rotate 2 steps to the right: [6,7,1,2,3,4,5] rotate 3 steps to the right: [5,6,7,1,2,3,4] Example 2: Input: [-1,-100,3,99] and k = 2 Output: [3,99,-1,-100] Explanation: rotate 1 steps to the right: [99,-1,-100,3] rotate 2 steps to the right: [3,99,-1,-100] Note: Try to come up as many solutions as you can, there are at least 3 different ways to solve this problem.
